We will introduce those of you who desire to know more to the Keylonta codes, and teach you how you may begin using Keylonta Therapeutics to accelerate your healing and evolution. Meanwhile, there are many new mind-technologies available, many communications from other knowledgeable sources that can set you on your way toward awakening. You can protect yourselves from covert manipulation, holographic inserts and forced matrix transplants by making the conscious intention of linking with your Soul Matrix, and by developing the intuitive aspects of your humanity You can sense such manipulations through the intuitions and emotions, so developing awareness of and sensitivity to these felt impressions of subtle energy is the most important thing you can do to ensure your safety. Learn to consciously channel the energy of your soul matrix into your conscious mind and you will have a direct Interior Guidance System to steer you away from harmful situations that exist outside of your range of perception.
